ui.datasetTip: Choose spatial resolution: COMMUNEUNION (finer) or DISTRICT (coarser).
ui.warncellsTip: Filter by specific WARNCELLID. Leave empty to keep all warnings.
ui.areaNameMatchTip: If enabled and names are configured below, alerts are also kept when areaDesc contains one of the names (case-insensitive).
ui.extraAreaNamesTip: Comma-separated list. Filter uses Warncell match OR name match in areaDesc.
ui.activeOnlyTip: Filters out alerts that already expired.
ui.staleAllowTip: Allow fallback to newest directory file when _LATEST_ returns 404. If disabled, the node will error in this case.
ui.autoRefreshTip: Interval for automatic fetches in seconds. 0 = disabled.
ui.fetchOnDeployTip: Trigger an initial fetch immediately after deploy.
ui.diagTip: Enable additional diagnostic log messages in the Node-RED log.

runtime.errorStaleNotAllowed: Stale data not allowed (LATEST 404 → directory fallback).
